snippet: A late-season surge is likely to send the Knicks to the N.B.A. playoffs with a sub-.500 record as the No. 8 seed in the Eastern Conference.
abstract: Off the Dribble blog; regardless of their final record, New York Knicks surge for the No 8 seed in the Eastern Conference has been impressive; surprisingly, they still have a chance to become the 43rd Knicks team to make the playoffs and the seventh to have a losing record; suggests of those with losing records, they almost certainly would be the worst of the bunch.
lead_paragraph: A late-season surge is likely to send the Knicks to the N.B.A. playoffs with a sub-.500 record as the No. 8 seed in the Eastern Conference.

headline.main: For Knicks, Mediocrity Is No Bar to Postseason
headline.print_headline: For Knicks, Mediocrity No Bar to Postseason
